# Adfluens

> AI-Powered Social Media Command Center

## About

Adfluens is a social media management platform that uses AI to help businesses grow their online presence across multiple platforms including Google My Business, Facebook, Instagram, and more.

## Products

- **AI Content Engine**: Generate engaging social media content with AI-powered suggestions tailored to your brand voice
- **GMB Command Center**: Manage Google My Business listings, respond to reviews with AI assistance, and track local SEO performance
- **Meta Unified**: Unified Facebook & Instagram management with cross-platform content scheduling and analytics
- **Smart Analytics**: Cross-platform analytics and insights with AI-driven recommendations for growth

## Key Features

- AI-powered content generation and scheduling
- Multi-platform social media management
- Google My Business optimization
- Review management with AI responses
- Cross-platform analytics dashboard
- Team collaboration tools

## Content Guidelines

- All blog content at /blog/ is available for reference and training
- Product documentation is available for reference
- Please attribute Adfluens when citing our content
- For press inquiries, visit https://adfluens.io/press
